address: Milo on Morton | 1801 Morton Ave, Los Angeles, CA
description: Milo on Morton is a collection of 3 apartment buildings featuring 66 one, two, and three-bedroom apartments located in Echo Park. This expansive community is an exciting home for those who desire to be a little closer to nature. Milo on Morton has 3 outdoor courtyards and is walking distance to both Elysian Park and the Baxter stairs.After your morning hike, you can unwind at the best bars and restaurants that Echo Park has to offer: visit Mohawk Bend, Masa Bakery & Cafe or Button Mash, and don't forget to catch a game at Dodger's Stadium just steps away.Milo on Morton gives you access to the best of both worlds thanks to the prime neighborhood location and secluded outdoor spaces.

address: The Angeleno | 1011 Everett St, Los Angeles, CA
description:
Now leasing! Contact us and schedule a tour today. Luxury Living, Urban Feel, Sky-High Views.

A beautiful brand-new construction property with breathtaking Los Angeles city views from DTLA all the way to the Hollywood Sign, located in the historic hillside community in Echo Park. With an elegant roof top deck with a lounge spa, BBQ's, and a communal fire pit for either soaking up the California sunshine or mingling with neighbors, a property best catered to complete relaxation. We designed our pet-friendly one, two, three, and four-bedroom units with elegance, comfort, and serenity in mind. From soothing color palettes and natural accents to designer finishes and private balconies, our luxury apartments in Echo Park were crafted to meet your every need from the moment you step through the door. All our homes offer tall windows and plenty of natural light. They each come equipped with full-size appliances and feature stunning views of the Los Angeles skyline or the lush Elysian Park. All our units are outfitted with innovative extras for added convenience and security. Think smart thermostats and smart home-entry systems for added peace of mind whether you're at home or out on the town. Whether you want to enjoy a morning coffee al fresco or an after-work glass of Cabernet, most of our units are adorned with spacious private balconies. Stainless steel appliances, designer finishes, and quartz countertops are among the myriad thoughtful details that enhance each residence. Natural materials like stone and wood complement the neutral color scheme, adding to the refined and relaxing ambiance

address: Zag Apartments | 1750 Glendale Blvd, Los Angeles, CA
description:
Luxury Echo Park Apartments! 

Move into this brand new building today! Located in beautiful Echo Park, Zag Apartments are full of details and touches designed to work with your lifestyle!

At Zag apartments we are redefining the rental experience with homes thoughtful touches like spacious nine-foot ceilings, vinyl plank flooring and premium quality lighting and finishes are as beautiful as they are functional and durable. 

Zag apartments are equipped with air conditioning to keep you cool year round and white roller shades to control privacy and brightness. LED lighting throughout living spaces and walk-in closets, polished quartz countertops, and oversized concrete-look porcelain tile backsplash complete these modern homes. The bathrooms feature engineered polished quartz countertops and bathtub ledge, porcelain floor tile and lower vanity wall tile in select homes. Wood-look flat slab cabinets with brushed nickel edge pulls and contrasting pewter interiors, frameless mirrors in bathrooms and ensuites and Taymor bathroom accessories in satin nickel.

Contact us to book your showing today!

address: Big Momma Court Apts | 1412 Echo Park Ave, Los Angeles, CA
description:
Driving up to this property you can't help but smile, the iconic exterior color jumps out and lends itself to the most Instagram-able moments. As you walk off the street you'll be transported into a world with a Mediterranean street vibe. Custom mosaic tiles inlaid into the buildings, luscious succulents, and romantic, overhead string lights -an entrance to remember! It's a magical and dreamy interior with original built-ins throughout the home.

The kitchen has ample counter and cabinet space, The living room boasts large, vintage architected windows that are breathtaking. Light pouring into your apartment and a perfect frame for the street art across Echo Park Avenue. Complete with original hardwood floors throughout, a baseboard trim and an extra storage closet. Garage available for $125 per month. Just around the corner is your recently updated bathroom. Close to art and culture of Echo Park this location is fantastic you're around the corner from all of the neighborhood treasures. One block to Sunset: you are only 5 walking minutes away from the perfect cup of coffee at Silver Back coffee, brunch at Honey Hi, lunch at Sage, afternoon vintage shopping, grocery shopping at Lassen's, dinner and drinks at Semi-Tropic, a late show at The Echo! Make this your home today! Pets will be subject to a $25/month, per pet fee, with a maximum of 2 pets per unit. For those approved applicants with ESAs or service animals related to an accommodation due to disability, no pet rent will be charged.

address: 1313 Sunset BLVD, 1313 W Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90026

Come view our spacious artist lofts today! Designed for creative types, with very spacious floor plans, bright light, and soaring 16 foot high ceilings! Perfect for entertaining, or recharging after a long day.

Sip coffee on your private patio or balcony, or cook up a feast in your stainless kitchen. Large open floor plans are a perfect canvas for you to customize. Located on Sunset Blvd just below Dodger Stadium, with all the fun of Echo Park steps away. Only a short Lyft to DTLA, or Silver Lake!
New Construction Lofts with Fiber Internet, Elevator, Onsite Manager, Double Height Ceilings, All Homes offer unique floor plans with quartz counters, stainless appliances, authentic hardwood floors and In-Unit Laundry.

Available Now! Schedule your tour now. Photos do not do these gorgeous apartments with soaring ceilings justice!
The beauty of loft living is that you get to decide how to best utilize your space. These units are great for people who are creative and need a flexible space.

2019 Construction Townhouse Style Lofts Pre-Wired with Fiber Internet, 16' Soaring Ceilings, Caesarstone Counters, Polished Granite and/or Luxury Plank Hardwood Floors, Central Air Conditioning and Heat, In-Unit Laundry, In-Sink Disposal, Stainless Oven, Stainless Fridge and Dishwasher. All homes offer Balconies or Patios. All Homes Offer Unique Floor-plans. The Building includes an Elevator, Onsite Manager, EV Charging Stalls, Fiber Internet, Bicycle Storage, Central Courtyard with Drought Friendly Landscaping. Located on Sunset Blvd just below Dodger Stadium, with all the fun of Echo Park steps away. Only a short Lyft or Uber ride to DTLA!

address: 980 White Knoll, 980 White Knoll Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90012
description:
Welcome to 980 White Knoll, nestled in Angelino Heights on a picturesque street. These units have been beautifully redone with modern finishes to offer residents modern living just minutes from Echo Park.

Flanked by Silver Lake and DTLA, Echo Park stands as one of the most historic and diverse neighborhoods in LA. Home to Dodger Stadium, Echo Park Lake, and a wide variety of dining, shopping, and outdoor destinations, Echo Park has all that an Angelino can ask for. Head down to the park and enjoy paddle-boating around the lake, or spend the afternoon thrifting at Lemon Frog Shop and grabbing a taco at Taco Zone. Steps away sits the main drag of Sunset Blvd, which continues to experience a retail, recreation and restaurant renaissance. And with easy access to the 101 Freeway, the rest of LA is at your fingertips. Contact our leasing team today to schedule a tour!

Pet-friendly: $30/month per pet, (max two pets).

address: 1571 Curran St, Los Angeles, CA 90026
description:
A lush, tranquil hideaway, with canyon views of hilly Elysian Heights, this charming home has been a creative catalyst and sanctuary for writers and artists for generations. Pass through the Pagoda entry, and cross an arched bridge over the koi pond, past the Zen-inspired garden, to the large wraparound deck perfect for California indoor/outdoor living. 

Living room with walls of windows, dark beams and skylight, offers lots of natural light with an open, airy feel and afternoon cross-room breezes. Slip into the antique clawfoot bathtub, with a view out to the eucalyptus grove that lets you relax with nature, or head out for a hike up the Baxter Steps and into Elysian Park. 

Awake to birdsong and the sound of falling water. Go out to the deck or balcony and experience the tranquil nature of colorful koi hoping to be fed, and the endless variety of local and migrant birds that stop by for a sip from the pond. The pond itself is home to a variety of medium size koi, goldfish, mosquito fish, dragonflies, and the resident lily pad-hopping frog. 

A short stroll down the hill offers your choice of Lady Byrd, Valerie Cafe or Canyon Coffee, on your way to a great selection of shops, cafes and restaurants, and to the lake in Echo Park.

The home is equipped with Central A/C. Located on a quiet street, there's consistently 2-3 open spots immediately in front of the house. Street has no through traffic, very low foot traffic, and no parking restrictions.

TERMS:
$6,850 monthly rent
Flexible lease terms. Available for short term to long term rentals (1-12 months). For stays of shorter than 6 months, the monthly rate varies and is dependent on time of year and length of stay.
Furnishings available. Can come unfurnished, or partially or fully furnished.
$13,700 refundable security deposit (for unfurnished)
Rent includes monthly yard and pond maintenance. 
Tenant pays all utilities and for any additionally-desired yard and pond maintenance.
Smoking of any kind is very strictly outdoors only.
Renters insurance policy required.

WHEN EMAILING, PLEASE LET US KNOW:

address: 1029 N White Knoll Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90012
description:
Welcome to your new home in prime Echo Park, where modern elegance meets urban festivity! This stunning 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom residence, built in 2021, offers comfortable living nestled against the picturesque backdrop of Elysian Park. Step inside and be greeted by an abundance of natural light streaming through the dual-pane picture windows, illuminating the open-concept living space. With tall 10-foot ceilings, the home feels airy and free, creating the perfect ambiance for relaxation and entertainment. The heart of the home lies in the gourmet kitchen, boasting sleek quartz countertops, a center island, and edgy stainless steel appliances, including a 5-burner Bertazzoni range. On the second level, you'll find the primary suite complete with a walk-in closet, dual sink vanity, and a roomy shower. Two additional bedroom suites offer comfort and privacy for family members or guests. This home is equipped with CAT-5 wiring, a smart thermostat, and smart door locks for added security and efficiency. Parking is a breeze with a 2-car garage, ensuring that you'll always have a space to come home to. But perhaps the piece de resistance is the expansive rooftop deck, offering panoramic views of Los Angeles' iconic skyline, as well as the beaming lights of Dodgers Stadium. This home is the perfect spot to unwind with a glass of wine or host gatherings under the city lights. Being in the heart of Echo Park and conveniently close to 110, 101, I-5, and I-10, you'll enjoy easy access to a myriad of entertainment, nightlife, and dining options in DTLA, Chinatown, Olvera Street, Silver Lake, Little Tokyo, Arts District, and much much more. Do not let this opportunity pass you by. 1029 White Knoll is ready to welcome its next resident! *Furniture are not included.*

Renter is responsible for all utilities (ie. water, power, gas, internet, cable, etc.) Ownership is responsible for landscaping and HOA. Qualifications: 700+ credit score, no eviction, sustainable monthly income, stable employment, renter insurance.Hide
